ygData.subject: First Contact

As the leader of the group, Diesel Runner was the first transformer to step 
away from the little party of Decepticon researchers and approach Maxima 
directly.

" I am Diesel Runner. And this is my crew." she announced in a clear voice 
as she gestured to herself and then those few bots that stood behind her.
Sand Storm gave a little wave "Hello".
Although D.R. paid him no mind as she went on, " We are Decepticon 
researchers that just became stranded on this strange planet when the space 
anomaly we were studying devoured our ship and transported us here. Our ship 
crashed near by but exploded soon after, leaving nothing but ashes.
We were fortunate you detected us so soon."
